vflip.c File Reference

vflip - performs one or more flip operations. More...

Detailed Description

vflip - performs one or more flip operations.

Description
vflip flips images horizontally and/or vertically.

A horizontal flip exchanges the left and right sides of an image. A vertical flip exchanges the top and bottom.

Usage
vflip
Parameters:
-in  input image
-out  output image
-horizontal  Flip horizontally. Default: false
-vertical  Flip vertically. Default: false
Examples

Known bugs
none.
